alert.note: Alert for Scotland (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 6:34PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Scotland County through 715 PM CDT... At 634 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Downing, or 7 miles west of Memphis, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Memphis around 650 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Greensburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
